summary: This is a court filing notice regarding a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim to Judge Alison Nathan concerning flashlight security checks at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). The document shows ongoing legal proceedings and conditions of confinement issues in Maxwell's criminal case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN, referenced in the docket text regarding a letter about MDC security checks.

persons.name: Alison Nathan
persons.context: Judge presiding over USA v. Maxwell case, recipient of the letter from defense counsel.

events.title: Defense Letter Regarding MDC Security
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim files a letter to Judge Alison Nathan concerning flashlight security checks at the Metropolitan Detention Center.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim filed a letter to Judge Alison Nathan regarding flashlight security checks at the MDC.
The document shows ongoing legal proceedings in case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN, USA v. Maxwell.
Multiple attorneys including Christian Everdell, David Boies, Jeffrey Pagliuca, Laura Menninger, Mark Cohen, and Sigrid McCawley received electronic notice of this filing.
The filing indicates concerns about Maxwell's conditions of confinement at the Metropolitan Detention Center.
